document_data.name: Belsarth Hawkblade
document_data.mainbody: '''Belsarth Hawkblade''' was a [[Highknight]] of [[Cormyr]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Hawkblade was grim, but his loyalty to the crown was unshakable. Despite his grimness, he was always cheery enough to hear about a wizard being disparaged.
document_data.History: Together with [[Lorton Ironstone]], Belsarth Hawkblade was part of an ambush waiting for [[Elminster Aumar]] when the latter tried to sneak into [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Suzail]] sometime after [[Mirtul 26]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}. Though Elminster was able to disable Hawkblade briefly with the use of a small [[dazzle powder]] bomb, reinforcements were in wait for precisely that eventuality. It was ultimately the [[ghost]] of the Regent [[Alusair Obarskyr]] that saved Elminster, knocking Belsarth him out cold.
